bibl.title: The Kibotos of Alexandria.
Giornate di Studio in Onore di Achille Adriani, Roma, 26-27 nov. 1984
bibl.author: EL FAKHARANI, Fawzi

bibl.note: The Kibotos was a closed port rectangular in shape. It was built in the Pharaonic period at the entrance of the navigable canal which connected the Mediterranean with Lake Mareotis.
EL FAKHARANI Fawzi, The Kibotos of Alexandria.
Sandro STUCCHI e Margherita BONANNO ARAVANTINOS (a cura di), Giornate di Studio in Onore di Achille Adriani, Roma, 26-27 nov. 1984 = StMisc 28 (Roma, 1991), pp. 21-28, 6 figg.
